title: How to Change Distance on Bumble

steps.title: Tap the yellow Hive icon.
steps.content: Tap the yellow Hive icon. You'll find this at the bottom-center of the Bumble app. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the filter icon.
steps.content: Tap the filter icon. This icon looks like two sliders, and you'll find it at the top-right corner of the screen. [2] X Research source This opens the search filters page, where you can modify your distance preferences.

steps.title: Drag the "Distance" slider to the desired position.
steps.content: Drag the "Distance" slider to the desired position. If you want to see potential matches that are farther away, drag the slider to the right. To decrease your preferred distance, drag the slider to the left. If there is no "Distance" slider, this feature is not available in your region. [3] X Research source If you're willing to see matches that are a little further away than the distance you specified, toggle the "Dealbreaker?" switch below the slider to the On (yellow) position.

steps.title: Tap the Apply button.
steps.content: Tap the Apply button. It's at the bottom of the screen. Your new distance preferences will take effect immediately.

steps.title: Click your profile picture.
steps.content: Click your profile picture. It's at the top-left corner of the Bumble homepage. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . You'll see it in the left panel near the middle of the menu. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Drag the "Distance" slider to the desired position.
steps.content: Drag the "Distance" slider to the desired position. If you want to include potential matches who are farther away, drag the slider to the right. To see only close-by matches, drag the distance to the left. You might have to click Filter in the right panel before you'll see the "Distance" slider. If there is no "Distance" slider, this feature is not available in your region. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click the X to close Settings.
steps.content: Click the X to close Settings. Your new preferences will take effect immediately.
